resources.string: Did you know that over 15 years Ago Mark Zuckerberg Creator of Facebook, invited five people to his room at Harvard? Reason? Talk about a business opportunity! Only two went to meet him and accepted the challenge!!! Today both are billionaires! Dustin Moskovitz with over 6.5 billion and Eduardo Saverin with over $ 3.4 billion. When a friend talks to you about a business opportunity, listen, open your mind, if he came to you it\'s because he saw in you something great .
